ygData.subject: RE: Plagued Large rats in SF
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, I finally got fed up with him and sent my Ranger over to F him up! ... I remember the Plague Rats of Steamfront from my days hunting Clockworks for my
ygData.messageBody:
Yea, I finally got fed up with him and sent my Ranger over to "F" him
up!

-----Original Message-----

I remember the Plague Rats of Steamfront from my days hunting
Clockworks for my Trueshot. And all those elementals, Minotaurs and
that Meldrath guy. I'm thinking it's payback time myself!

Revenge is a dish best served on the end of a sword!

Tuldayen Grimblade
39th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule

[Steven R. Hulse]
